title: Kauai's Hidden Waterfalls
content: Kauai, the Garden Isle of Hawaii, is a paradise for nature enthusiasts. Beyond its postcard-perfect beaches, this rugged island boasts a treasure trove of waterfalls—some easily accessible, others tucked away in the heart of lush jungles.

title: Longest flight ever
content: Flying from Hawaii to Italy was the longest flight ever. We were so tired and slept a lot.

title: It's all about the swimming.
content: We never left the pool really after we landed in Italy. We were staying in a house in the country side and it included a pool. Kids would've slept in it if we'd have let them.

title: It was beautful but too crowded
content: The church in the square is so big and grey from the outside, but on the inside it's quite magical. Wish I could visit it when it's empty.

title: The best city ever
content: We walked around this great city for hours. Even the kids loved it.

title: Our favorite day
content: The ferry between the islands was such a lovely ride. We thought about going the next day too.

title: ooohhh Venice
content: I could live there. We're planning the move as we speak. But I'd have to bring food with me. Couldn't eat a thing while we were there.

title: Festival
content: The umbrella festival is held every year in july when the weather is the hottest.

title: Beach towns are a must
content: Getting here was hard but staying here was easy. The water is so blue and clear.
